name: AS_GSS_UT_finalizedApiAndRefVendorsRecordListForStateAndLocal
description: Compares vendors returned from ref record and Vm for State and local
sail_code:
rule!AS_GSS_QR_getReferenceVendors(
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "OR",
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein,
        operator: "includes",
        value: tostring(ri!searchTerm)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin,
        operator: "includes",
        value: tostring(ri!searchTerm)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.formattedLegalName,
        operator: "includes",
        value: tostring(upper(ri!searchTerm))
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
        operator: "includes",
        value: tostring(ri!searchTerm)
      )
    }
  )
)
